title: 21-Day Rotations and Tour Extensions
content: Standard UK offshore tours are 21 consecutive days, 12-hour shifts. This pattern exists due to transport and accommodation constraints. Tour extensions beyond 21 days require OIM authorization and fitness assessment. Extended tours increase fatigue and error riskâ€”balance operational need against human performance limits.
